body.p: SOUTH BEEF RIVER Ronnie Rindahl is spending a few days at the home of his aunt, Mrs. Christianson. Joyce Olson has enrolled as a 2d grader in the Levis school, making an enrollment of 23. Mrs. Loken, Helga. Tommy, Inga and Clarence, and George Jackson visited at the Leonard Rindahl home. Mr. and Mrs. Russel and son, Mr. and Mrs. Clarence Zank and daughter spent Sunday evening at the Richards home. Mr. and Mrs. Leonard Rindahl are the parents" of a son born March 8, 1939. Mrs. John Amundson is caring for mother and babe.
